attributes.action: Review legislation such that assessments consider full financial status rather than just income
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Claims for Tax Credits, Legal Aid and even Child maintenance all have no bearing on dispossable income and the outgoings being incurred.  Although someone may earn over a threshold, there may be legitimate outgoings that brings that dispossable income below the threshold.  Decisions simply based on income may result impact financial hardship due to commitments being imposed by legislation.  Rules should be applied to assess all parties financial position before making a decision.
